title: Tilapia Stew with Green Peppers

ingredients.name: can stewed tomatoes with Italian seasonings

instructions: Place a large saucepan over medium heat until hot. Coat the pan with nonstick cooking spray, add the bell pepper, and cook 5 minutes or until beginning to lightly brown, stirring frequently.

Add the tomatoes and water, increase to high heat, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat, cover tightly, and simmer until the tomatoes are tender. Using the back of a spoon, break up the larger pieces of tomato.

Add the fish and seasonings and stir very gently. Increase the heat to high and bring just to a boil. Reduce the heat, cover tightly, and simmer 3 minutes or until the fish is opaque in the center. Remove from the heat and let stand, covered, 10 minutes to develop flavors.
